entities.name: dumbledore

entities.name: hermione

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being surprised by the news of Harry's private lessons with Dumbledore and reacting to it.

relationships.description: Dumbledore will be giving Harry private lessons this year.
Hermione is quoting Dumbledore's words about forgiveness.
Ron is surprised by the news of Harry's private lessons with Dumbledore.
Dumbledore told Hermione about his conversation with Harry.
